hospitality.title: Warm Hospitality
hospitality.description: Feel welcomed by the genuine kindness of locals eager to share their culture and traditions with visitors.

hero.title: Morocco Through Our Lens
hero.subtitle: Explore the beauty, culture, and landscapes that make Morocco unforgettable

hero.title: Curators of the Red City
hero.subtitle: We don't just show you Marrakech. We invite you to become part of its story.

story.title: Crafting Authentic Moroccan Journeys
story.description1: Founded with a simple mission: to peel back the layers of typical tourism and reveal the beating heart of Morocco. We started as a small team of passionate locals who wanted to share the Morocco we know and love—the one of hidden riads, ancient traditions, and warm hospitality.
story.description2: Over the years, we've grown into a family of expert guides, drivers, and artisans, all united by a single purpose: making your visit unforgettable.
story.description3: What sets us apart is our deep connection to the land. We are not just guides; we are storytellers, historians, and friends who want to share the hidden gems that only locals know.
story.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
story.author: Aldous Huxley

values.title: Guiding Principles
values.subtitle: Every journey we design is built upon a foundation of respect, quality, and genuine connection.

passion.title: Passion
passion.desc: Deeply rooted love for Marrakech and its rich cultural heritage drives every experience we create.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.desc: Showcasing the real Marrakech—genuine cultural immersion over superficial tourist attractions.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Working closely with local artisans to ensure our tourism directly benefits the people who make this city special.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.desc: Committed to environmentally responsible practices that preserve our natural beauty for future generations.

cta.quote: We believe that travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer. Come, let us show you the richness of Morocco.

hero.title: Marrakech
hero.subtitle: Where ancient traditions meet modern luxury in a symphony of colors, scents, and sounds.

intro.title: A City of Contrasts & Timeless Beauty
intro.desc1: Marrakech is a sensory overload in the best possible way. From the chaotic charm of the Jemaa el-Fnaa square to the serene silence of the Majorelle Garden, the city offers a diverse palette of experiences.
intro.desc2: Whether you seek the thrill of bargaining in the souks, the relaxation of a traditional hammam, or the taste of authentic tagine, Marrakech delivers with unmatched style.
intro.author: Yves Saint Laurent

medina.title: Ancient Medina
medina.desc: A UNESCO World Heritage site labyrinth.

food.title: Culinary Heaven
food.desc: World-famous street food and fine dining.

dayTrips.title: Escape the City Walls
dayTrips.subtitle: Discover the wonders just a short drive from Marrakech. From the refreshing Ouzoud Waterfalls to the historic Ait Ben Haddou.

activities.title: Unforgettable Moments
activities.subtitle: Curated activities to immerse you in the local culture, adventure, and relaxation.

cta.title: Your Marrakech Story Starts Here.
cta.subtitle: Let us craft the perfect itinerary for your Moroccan adventure. From airport pickup to desert sunsets, we handle every detail.

hero.title: Your Freedom, Your Morocco
hero.subtitle: Select your personal driver, choose your vehicle, and craft your own journey. Experience the luxury of total flexibility.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We believe the driver makes the journey. That's why we let you choose the perfect match for your travel style.

browse.title: Browse Profiles
browse.desc: View detailed portfolios, read bios, and check specialties to find your connection.

select.title: Select & Connect
select.desc: Choose your driver and vehicle, then chat directly to plan your perfect itinerary.

enjoy.title: Enjoy the Ride
enjoy.desc: Relax in luxury while your local expert handles the navigation and logistics.
